title: It's Time To Wake, Jake!
description: "Jake, Jake, it's time to wake!What sport will you play today?Quick, quick, it's time to pick!How will you spend your day?"On this particular day, Jake, a sports obsessed boy chooses to play basketball. Follow Jake through playful rhymes as he learns about fair play and good sportsmanship. He leads his team to victory and goes to bed dreaming about what sport he will play the following day.
author: Amanda Beth Connolly
